info.title: Ontology-Based Topic Detection
info.description: A text analysis service to find out what any text is about by extracting the most relevant Wikipedia’s categories through a patented NLP technology

post.description: Returns the top themes associated to the given text

parameters.name: cleanup

parameters.description: Set to true to receive parent/child relations between categories

parameters.name: nbtopcat

parameters.description: Set the language of the given document (prevent the auto-detection)
